SEARCH
Package ep

Class AEvent

java.lang.Object
ep.AEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Death, Mutation, Observation, Reproduction
public abstract class AEvent extends Object implements IEvent
The AEvent class is an abstract class that implements the IEvent interface. It provides common functionality for event objects in a simulation. Note: This class assumes the existence of the IEvent interface. Implementations of the IEvent interface are not provided here.
